NotYourTurn.Mode_Hint: Determines behavior when token is moved when its not its turn for each permission level
NotYourTurn.IgnoreButton_Hint: Determines who can see the ignore button in the dialog box
NotYourTurn.RequestButton_Hint: Allow players to request the GM to allow movement
NotYourTurn.ChatMessages_Hint: Creates a chat message when a token is moved when it's not its turn if set to 'warning only' or 'dialog box'
NotYourTurn.AlwaysBlock_Hint: Always block combat movement, even when it's the token's turn
NotYourTurn.Dialog_Text: You're trying to move, but it is not your turn
NotYourTurn.UI_RequestGranted: The GM has granted your request
NotYourTurn.UI_RequestDeclined: The GM has declined your request
NotYourTurn.UI_GMnotOnScene: Declined, the GM is not on the same scene
NotYourTurn.MovementWhisper: moved when it was not their turn
